# DateTimeUtility.FromUnixTimestamp method

Returns the converted UnixTimestamp in a DateTime.

```csharp
public static DateTime FromUnixTimestamp(long unixTimestamp)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| unixTimestamp | The UnixTimestamp, in seconds from epoch. |

## Return Value

Returns the DateTime representation of the UnixTimestamp.
